socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Supported Active Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Chaos, Duration, Projectile, Bow

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire arrows into the air that rain down around the targeted area, dealing damage to enemies they hit and creating spore pods where they land. Each spore pod deals chaos damage over time to nearby enemies and slows their movement speed. The pods last for a duration before bursting, dealing area damage.
explicitMods: Deals 316.2 Base Chaos Damage per second
Base duration is 1.00 seconds
Fires 4 additional Arrows
60% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Modifiers to Projectile Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
10% increased Area of Effect
Each Spore Pod applies 5% less Movement Speed to nearby Enemies, to a maximum of 30%
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Mirage Archer
Supported Skills have 20% increased Skill Effect Duration
When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer lasts 4 seconds
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

ref_items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
7% increased Attack Speed
+66 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Chaos, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their chaos resistance and increasing damage over time they take. All hits will deal added chaos damage to the cursed enemies.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.90 seconds
Curse gains 10 Doom per second if you Cast this Spell yourself
+10 to radius
Cursed enemies have -29% to Chaos Resistance
Cursed enemies take 35% increased Damage from Damage Over Time effects
Adds 46 to 57 Chaos Damage to Hits against Cursed Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires multiple arrows into the air, to land in sequence after a delay, starting at the targeted location and spreading outwards in all directions. Each arrow deals damage in an area around it. Half of the arrows will land directly on targets if there are targets in their range.
explicitMods: Fires 21 additional Arrows
10% increased Area of Effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.
explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
10% increased Effect of Supported Curses
Supported Skills have 12% reduced Curse Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
